recipe.title: Slow Cooker Chocolate Fondue Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ¼ cups ; semi-sweet chocolate chips ; (220 g)

steps.step: Add the chocolate chips, heavy cream, and salt to a slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 30-45 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes, or until fully melted.
Turn the slow cooker to warm and serve the fondue with your favorite items for dipping.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the chocolate chips, heavy cream, and salt to a slow cooker.
Cover and cook on high for 30-45 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes, or until fully melted.
Turn the slow cooker to warm and serve the fondue with your favorite items for dipping.
